body: so i was banned again and i regret what i did. so i tried to connect again to see who banned me and it said MAP DEV steven5703 so that prompted a question. Can map developers ban people
body_tagged: so i was banned again and i regret what i did. so i tried to connect again to see who banned me and it said MAP DEV steven5703 so that prompted a question. Can map developers ban people
title: can map devs ban ppl?

replies.body: He was a Mod then he retired.
replies.body_tagged: He was a Mod then he retired.

replies.body:
No, Steven retired and the ban doesn't gets appealed if a staffmember/mod retires.
Only Moderators + have ban permissions.
replies.body_tagged:
No, Steven retired and the ban doesn't gets appealed if a staffmember/mod retires.
Only Moderators + have ban permissions.

replies.body:
The person who banned you decided to retire (when they were still a moderator.) It just shows this because that person punished you before retiring. The ban is still valid. 

So in short, no.
replies.body_tagged:
The person who banned you decided to retire (when they were still a moderator.) It just shows this because that person punished you before retiring. The ban is still valid. 

So in short, no.
